questions.question: Where does “Three Skeleton Key” take place?
The narrator says the boat is derelict. What does he mean?
"Three Skeleton Key" is the name of _______________.

choices.answer: The ship that the rats arrive on
The rock in the ocean that the lighthouse is built on
The top room in the lighthouse

questions.question: Why is the rock called "Three Skeleton Key?"

choices.answer: Three haunted keys were buried beneath the rock
Three skeletons were found inside the lighthouse built there
The skeletons of 3 escaped convicts were found on the rock

questions.question: How do the rats get to the lighthouse on "Three Skeleton Key"?

choices.answer: They arrived on an ship that has no crew
They have lived on "Three Skeleton Key" for centuries

questions.question: What happened to the crew of the abandoned ship that crashes into "Three Skeleton Key?"

choices.answer: The crew was eaten alive by the rats
The crew took life boats to escape the rats aboard
It was a ghost ship and had no crew
The crew is drunk and passed out in the cabin of the ship

questions.question: How does Le Gleo signal that the 3 men are trapped in the lighthouse and need help?

choices.answer: Le Gleo lights an emergency flare
Le Gleo does not turn the light of the lighthouse on
Le Gleo radios someone for help

questions.question: What happens to Le Gleo after days of being trapped and antagonized by the rats?

choices.answer: He loses his mind, saying "THREE Skeleton Key" is now "SIX".
He is eaten alive by the rats.
He eventually retires from lighthouse service.

questions.question: In the end, what happens to Itchoua?

choices.answer: He ends up in an insane asylum, like Le Gleo.
He dies from infection from the rat bites.
He survives and returns to work at "Three Skeleton Key".
He drowns in the ocean trying to escape the rats.

questions.question: How are the men rescued from the rats on "Three Skeleton Key"?

choices.answer: A patrol boat uses meat to lure the rats & set them on fire.
The three men blow up the rats.
Their wives come to rescue the crew.

questions.question: What happens to our narrator in the end of the story?

choices.answer: He never enters a lighthouse again.
He ends up hospitalized from his rat bites.
He returns to work  on "Three Skeleton Key".
He ends up in an insane asylum.

questions.question: What is it called when an author provides hints for a story?
Which of the following is Foreshadowing for the fate of a character?

choices.answer: LeGleo dreams about three skeletons and talks in his sleep.
Itchousa explains how the ship is not the Flying Dutchman.
The narrator sees a Dutch ship headed for the island.
The narrator notices a tugboat carrying rat meat.

questions.question: Why was the island dangerous?

choices.answer: It had sharks in the water and slippery rock surfaces.
The light was lacking in food.
The light required daily dance routines like the robot.

questions.question: What is a synonym of the word Edible?
What is an antonym of the word Derisive?
What is a synonym of Fathom?
What is a synonym for Receding?
What is an antonym for Horde?
Into which genre would you place this story?
